mapper.select: SELECT ca.club_activity_id AS id, ca.created_date_time, ca.member_id AS creatorId, cm2.name AS creatorName, ca.updated_date_time, ca.access_type, ca.body, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM club_activity_like cal WHERE cal.club_activity_id = ca.club_activity_id) AS likeCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM club_activity_comment cam WHERE cam.club_activity_id = ca.club_activity_id) AS commentCount FROM club_activity ca LEFT JOIN member cm ON ca.member_id = cm.member_id LEFT JOIN club_member cm2 ON cm2.deleted_date_time = NULL AND cm2.club_id = #{clubId} AND cm2.member_id = ca.member_id WHERE ca.deleted_date_time IS NULL AND ca.club_id = #{clubId} AND ca.access_type = 'ALL' ORDER BY ca.created_date_time DESC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM club_activity ca WHERE ca.deleted_date_time IS NULL AND ca.club_id = #{clubId} AND ca.access_type = 'ALL' ORDER BY ca.created_date_time DESC
